headline: Is Universal Health Services (UHS) Attractive After The Recent 9% Share Price Pullback?
summary: Wondering if Universal Health Services at around US$201.81 is offering you real value right now, or if the recent price action is sending a warning signal? The stock is down around 9.0% over the past week and 9.3% over the last month, even though the 1 year return sits at 10.0% and the 5 year return at 58.9%. Recent attention on the hospital and behavioral health space, including ongoing discussions around healthcare capacity, reimbursement conditions and demand for inpatient care, has kept...
